entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:31 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rock River 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -22.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -28.1°C
Wind: ESE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Fog patches this evening and after midnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Blizzard developing in the afternoon. Flurries near the Ogilvie mountains. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 90 near the Richardson mountains late in the afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Blizzard. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 90 near the Richardson mountains. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 35 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
